dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: ...so this whole, like, Alexey Volkov thing, I'm a bit lost, uh, what's even going on?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: ...so this whole, like, Alexey Volkov thing, I'm a bit lost, uh, what's even going on?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, so, um, President Tokayev, he recently met with Volkov, who's the director of the Institute of Diplomacy.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, so, um, President Tokayev, he recently met with Volkov, who's the director of the Institute of Diplomacy.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: President Kassym-Jomart Tokayev received the director of the Institute of Diplomacy Alexey Volkov, according to a statement from Akorda.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right, but like, why is that, uh, significant? Is he just visiting?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, but like, why is that, uh, significant? Is he just visiting?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No, no. He's been nominated for a pretty big role, Deputy Secretary General of, um, a new organization.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, no. He's been nominated for a pretty big role, Deputy Secretary General of, um, a new organization.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Head of State received the director of the Institute of Diplomacy of the Academy of Public Administration under the President of the Republic of Kazakhstan Alexey Volkov in connection with his nomination to the post of Deputy Secretary General of the International Organization for the Russian Language.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Deputy Secretary General of... what exactly?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Deputy Secretary General of... what exactly?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: The International Organization for the Russian Language. That's, like, the full name.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The International Organization for the Russian Language. That's, like, the full name.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Head of State received the director of the Institute of Diplomacy of the Academy of Public Administration under the President of the Republic of Kazakhstan Alexey Volkov in connection with his nomination to the post of Deputy Secretary General of the International Organization for the Russian Language.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh. Okay. And what does that organization, you know, even do?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh. Okay. And what does that organization, you know, even do?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, it's set up to, uh, promote humanitarian initiatives, cultural stuff, science, education, across its member states.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, it's set up to, uh, promote humanitarian initiatives, cultural stuff, science, education, across its member states.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This structure was created to promote humanitarian initiatives, implement joint projects of member states in the fields of culture, science, and education.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right, so, like, who are these member states?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, so, like, who are these member states?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: You've got Belarus, Kazakhstan, Kyrgyzstan, Russia, Tajikistan, and Uzbekistan. Six countries.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: You've got Belarus, Kazakhstan, Kyrgyzstan, Russia, Tajikistan, and Uzbekistan. Six countries.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The founders of the organization are six countries: Belarus, Kazakhstan, Kyrgyzstan, Russia, Tajikistan and Uzbekistan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Ah, okay. And Volkov is, um, from Kazakhstan, right? That Institute of Diplomacy...
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Ah, okay. And Volkov is, um, from Kazakhstan, right? That Institute of Diplomacy...

dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. He leads the Institute of Diplomacy, which is part of their Public Administration Academy.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: And that Institute, I mean, that's important, isn't it?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And that Institute, I mean, that's important, isn't it?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, yeah, it's the place, actually, the only center in Kazakhstan that trains their, uh, professional diplomats.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, yeah, it's the place, actually, the only center in Kazakhstan that trains their, uh, professional diplomats.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Institute of Diplomacy is the only center in the country that trains professional diplomatic personnel, specialists in the field of international relations.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So it's like, really central to their whole, um, foreign policy, then?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So it's like, really central to their whole, um, foreign policy, then?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. It's essential. It used to be called the Diplomatic Academy, actually, and, uh, celebrated its 25th in 2021.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. It's essential. It used to be called the Diplomatic Academy, actually, and, uh, celebrated its twenty fifth in twenty twenty one.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On September 10, 2021, the institute celebrated the 25th anniversary of its establishment as the Diplomatic Academy of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Kazakhstan.
